name: Stand O'Food
description:
Tasty time-management best-seller Stand O’Food® comes to PSP® (PlayStation®Portable) system and PSP®go system! In the game you are challenged to manage fast food restaurants and feed hungry customers. Making variety of appetizing burgers requires attention to detail, strategic thinking and of course some cooking talent – you should care about the choice of ingredients, appropriate condiments and saving money for new cool appliances.

Stand O'Food® is highly recommended for fans of time management games, who will appreciate easy-to-learn controls, intuitive game action and smooth navigation tailored for PSP® system!

Game features:
• 2 gameplay modes: Quest and Lunch Rush
• More than 100 levels
• 80+ sandwiches to create
• Close to 20 upgrades to purchase
